main event: On 22 December 1952, two dark ground vessels were observed near Glynnco, Georgia, moving horizontally at a very low altitude and at high speeds.
interesting points: Witnesses reported no other aircraft in the vicinity during the sighting., The objects were described as bright lights pulsing and flashing above the water., The objects tailed erratically and vanished at close range., This sighting is documented as a part of Project Blue Book's investigations into UFOs., The report was submitted by Captain George Schufran of the USAF.
sighted object: two dark ground vessels emitting bright lights
